job.title: Machine Learning Engineer/ Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Long Term Project (18+ Months)</p><p>We are looking for ML and Data Scientist both candidates.</p><p><br></p><p>Must be strong with Azure and Databricks.</p><p>Must be strong with Azure data pipeline creation.</p><p>Experience with ML Model deployment.</p><p>Expert with python/spark</p><p>Strong knowledge of basic DS/ML Concepts</p><p>Experience with NLP</p>
